nodes.text: Talon Company was a Company affiliated with the Empire. It was lead by a General named Narell Balrekk who had a great deal of military experience. The Battle of the Gauntlet was an extremely important to Talon Company because the possibility of capturing someone aligned with Alliance High Command would mean that the company would get recognised by Darth Vader and the Emperor.
Talon Company is also the name of a Mercenary organization in Fallout.
